scripts.aws:check:
aws sts get-caller-identity | grep -q 073521391622 || (printf 'ERROR: Testing push image to ECR.
 * AWS cli not installed
 * AWS envs are NOT declared' && echo && echo && exit 1)
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:pre && npm run build:post
scripts.docker:check: ! docker images > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo 'ERROR: Docker is NOT running. Please install or restart' && echo && exit 1 || echo 'INFO: Docker is running...'
scripts.start:local: yarn docker:check && yarn aws:check && STATE_isPre=true isLocal=true AWS_ACCOUNT_ID=073521391622 node src/actionHandler
scripts.start:dry: STATE_isPre=true isLocal=true dryRun=true AWS_ACCOUNT_ID=073521391622 node src/actionHandler
